King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸

sentences.english: Why choose Gou yield and Revival.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼勾踐要選擇屈服和臥薪嚐膽。

sentences.english: This is the story of hardships known Gou same.
sentences.chinese: 這與家喻戶曉的勾踐臥薪嚐膽的典故如出一轍。
勾踐從來沒有忘記這段恥辱。

sentences.english: Three years later, Gou Jian was set free and returned to the State of Yue.
sentences.chinese: 三年以後，勾踐終於被釋放回了越國。

sentences.english: Gou Jian got a chance eventually, lift arms answer state.
sentences.chinese: 勾踐終於得到了機會，舉兵復國。

sentences.english: However, Goujian's story has another reading, too.
sentences.chinese: 但是，勾踐的故事還有另一方法解讀。

sentences.english: Gou secretly trained his army after he went back to his own state.
sentences.chinese: 回到他自己的國家後，勾踐祕密地訓練自己的軍隊。

sentences.english: Many years later, he was set free.
sentences.chinese: 幾年以後，勾踐被放回越國。

sentences.chinese: 幾年以後，勾踐被放回越國。
